meanings.definition: To smear or rub with oil or an oily substance.
meanings.sent1: She anointed her hands with lotion.
meanings.sent2: The priest anointed the baby with holy oil.
meanings.sent3: He mistakenly anointed the doorknob with cooking oil instead of WD-40.
meanings.sent4: The sun anointed the sky with golden hues at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The chef anointed the dish with a drizzle of olive oil.

meanings.definition: The act of applying oil or ointment as a religious rite or symbol of consecration.
meanings.sent1: The anointing of the sick is a sacred ritual in many faiths.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, the priest performed the anointing of the altar.
meanings.sent3: The anointing of the door hinges with oil made them squeak less.
meanings.sent4: The anointing of the newborn prince marked the beginning of his reign.
meanings.sent5: The anointing of the champion's forehead with oil signified victory.

meanings.definition: The act of choosing or appointing someone for a particular position or task.
meanings.sent1: Her anointing as team captain was well-deserved.
meanings.sent2: The anointing of the new CEO brought fresh ideas to the company.
meanings.sent3: The anointing of the class clown as prom king was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The anointing of the artist as the official mural painter was met with applause.
meanings.sent5: The anointing of the student council president was a moment of pride for her family.
